name: Mountain CD 2010
description:
The second full length album released by Turtle Bangs. This CD is enclosed in a jewel case containing four panels of CD art. 11 songs of some good ole rock n' roll. 

"...a bold and aggressive album, which is sure to permeate astute rock fans’ ears and give them something to sink their teeth into."
-Eric Allen, The Murfreesboro Pulse

"If you mashed up the alternative genres skirting the mainstream during the’70s and ’90s and churned it out with one guitar and drum set in a snarling, sexy, dirty mess, you’d have “Mountain” ... Bare-bones as the album may be, each song is profoundly multi-faceted with tracks that can go from jam-band slow to warped speed over the course of two minutes."
-Jessica Pace, Nashville Deli

1. Desert Stone
2. There is No Time
3. Song Three
4. Shake
5. Wipe
6. Wait For
7. Oh My Brother
8. Wolf
9. Molly
10. Blues
11. Mountain Song

Produced, Recorded, Engineered, Mixed, Mastered by Hank Parker Pruett and Turtle Bangs at Country House Records.

name: Give Me Your Daughter CD 2009
description:
Turtle Bangs first full length CD. A two panel CD cover in a plastic sleeve with a CD complete with CD art.

1. I am an Animal
2. You and I
3. The Light
4. All the World is Green
5. The Moon is Rising
6. God is a Record Player
7. Because You're Mine
8. Wound Splinters
9. Hey Elizabeth

Produced, Recorded, Engineered, Mixed, Mastered by Edward Carter and Turtle Bangs at Country House Records.
